Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Beta-defensin 10 (BD-10, mBD-10; Defensin, beta 10; Rodents, mammals, animals)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Tissue specificity: Expressed in both adult and neonate brain, and very weakly in kidneys, epididymis, and testis.

Literature.Title: Signal sequence conservation and mature peptide divergence within subgroups of the murine beta-defensin gene family.
Literature.Author: Morrison G.M, Semple C.A.M, Kilanowski F.M, Hill R.E, Dorin J.R.

Literature.Title: Lineage-specific biology revealed by a finished genome assembly of the mouse.
Literature.Author: Church D.M, Goodstadt L, Hillier L.W, Zody M.C, Goldstein S, et al, Ponting C.P.
